data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 6,100 people living in Santa Rita, Guam. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Rita, Guam

data.prayer: Father, help the 970 believers in Santa Rita to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Santa Rita.
Jesus, please give your people in Santa Rita, Guam a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Santa Rita a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, there are 4,674 people in the state of Santa Rita who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Santa Rita, Guam who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Santa Rita, Guam has a population of 6,100.

We estimate Santa Rita has 970 people who might know Jesus, 4,674 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 456 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.
